conclusion: Analyze the scene considering effects of power, collision, and deflection.
A is moving from the right side of the image towards the left.
Objects in the scene: blue cube in lower left, red cube, purple cube, yellow cube, green cube in middle, blue marble in lower center.
A is likely to collide with the yellow cube first as it is the closest object in its path.
After colliding with the yellow cube, A will be deflected towards either the purple cube or the blue marble.
If deflected towards the purple cube, A will collide with it next.
If deflected towards the blue marble, A will collide with the marble instead.
After colliding with the second object, A will likely come to a stop due to energy dissipation.
A will first collide with the yellow cube, then either the purple cube or the blue marble, and eventually stop.
Assumes A has enough initial power for deflection and collisions are inelastic.
